=== Raw music files ===
{{IN|je}}, the music files can be found in {{code|[[.minecraft]]/assets/objects}}.{{fn|The files in the <samp>objects</samp> folder are hashed. To locate the music files, see [[Tutorial:Sound directory]].}}

{{IN|be}} and ''[[Minecraft Education]]'', it can be found in:

* Mobile: {{code|[[com.mojang]]/resource_packs/music/vanilla_music/sounds/music/game/}}
* Windows: {{code|%PROGRAMFILES%\WindowsApps\Microsoft.MinecraftUWP_''<version>''_x64_8wekyb3d8bbwe\data\resource_packs\vanilla_music\sounds\music\game}}

All music files are in {{w|Vorbis|Ogg Vorbis}}.

== Trivia ==
* The motif of "Infinite Amethyst" can be heard in "[[Deeper]]" and "[[Endless]]".
* The motif of "Infinite Amethyst" can be heard in several remixes outside the game:
** ''[[Minecraft Live: 2023 (Original Soundtrack)]]'': "Vanilla Segment".
** ''[[Minecraft Live: 2024 (Original Soundtrack)]]'': "Looking Back and Forward" and "Minecraft Experience"
** ''[[Minecraft: Pixel Genesis]]'': "Infinite Amethyst (Snail's House Remix)", "Deeper (Elliot Hsu Remix)" and "Endless (Anamanaguchi Remix)".
** ''[[Minecraft: The Garden Awakens]]'': "Infinite Spooky Amethyst" and its variations.
** ''[[Minecraft Live: March 2025 (Original Soundtrack)]]'': "Welcome", "Welcome Back", "Infinite Interstitial ([[Chicken]])", "A Live Event", "Infinite Interstitial ([[Enderman]])", "[[Vibrant Visuals]]", "Vibrant Diary" and "Infinite Interstitial ([[Allay]])".
* From May 14, 2024<ref>{{ytl|LKw_2rj7hLc|Minecraft is turning 15 &vert; Come celebrate with us!|Minecraft|May 14, 2024|t=61}}</ref> to Sep 30, 2024,<ref>{{ytl|9pF_VGP7NVA|Minecraft Live 2024: Minecraft Experience &vert; Villager Rescue|Minecraft|Sep 30, 2024|t=81}}</ref> the motif of "Infinite Amethyst" in "Vanilla Segment" has been used in the special [[15th anniversary]] outro screen of the official [https://youtube.com/@minecraft ''Minecraft'' YouTube channel].
* The track was used by [[Netflix]] in the [[Minecraft Animated Series|''Minecraft'' series]] [https://youtube.com/shorts/QCthaMqjezc announcement video].
